name: Re-Boot
description:
You are trying to escape a hellscape like dimension. The only way you fight back against the odds trying to stop you is by using an experimental Boots. By the way, beware going near certain rocks causes Boots to malfunction. 

Discord Tag: NuclearWatt#1510

 Planning to include more  in the upcoming few days like more features,  quality of life updates and polish to the game in the future.

Some of the features planned out are:

1.More new abilities.

2.New levels with various visuals.

3.New enemies and a Boss Fight.

4.Story and lore.

5.Sound and Music.

Thanks  :)
